Package entity

Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.CompanyRep
public class CompanyRep extends User
Represents a company representative in the system.

Extends User and includes additional information such as the associated company, application approval status, department, position, and email (used as the login ID).

Company representatives must be approved by Career Center staff before they can log in successfully.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String email, String name, Company company, String department, String position)
      Creates a new company representative with the provided details. The representative starts with CompanyRepStatus.PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      email - the representative's email (also used as userId)
      name - the representative's name
      company - the company this representative belongs to
      department - the representative's department
      position - the representative's job position

    • login

      public boolean login(String id, String password2)
      Attempts to log in the company representative.

      Login succeeds only if:

      • the entered credentials match, and
      • the representative's status is CompanyRepStatus.APPROVED
      Otherwise, an appropriate message is shown and login fails.
      Specified by:
      login in class User
      Parameters:
      id - the entered user ID
      password2 - the entered password
      Returns:
      true if login succeeds, otherwise false
